entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries or ice pellets overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain or drizzle. High 6.
entry.summary: Ice pellets changing to rain or periods of drizzle in the morning. Risk of freezing rain in the morning. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 6. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Rain or periods of drizzle ending in the evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or rain. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
